name: 💭Somnior: Dream-Simulation🦛
description:
Trying to experience dreams while being awake can prove a difficult task. Luckily there are some techniques that focus on recreating a dream-experience!

Somnior: Dream-Simulation is an experimental, surreal artgame, which aims to convey the 'Dream-experience' through the following 3 methods:


1.) Simulation: The 'dream' is explicitly represented and mimiced. The game was developed with a dream-diary in mind!

2.) Surrealism: Most content is randomly generated, at least to some degree, and has no apparent sense, going so far as being incoherent and illogical in nature - giving you plenty of space to create your own meaning! 

3.) Daydreaming: Multiple aspects of the game encourage the usage of the player's imagination - trying to inspire an individual fiction.

______________________________________

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

______________________________________
Game by Leo S.

Some third Party Assets used in the project from:

- Textures.com (Textures)
- AmbientCG (Textures)
- Pexels.com (Textures)
- PMSFX (Sound FX)
- Musescore 3.6 (Fluid-R3 Soundfont)
- Google fonts

List of used software can be found in the build.
